title: Week 12 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 11/22)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 12 gambling advice, covering all 13 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Packers-49ers (5:10), Seahawks-Eagles (11:40), Raiders-Jets (17:30), Lions-Redskins (22:00), Jags-Titans (26:45), Steelers-Bengals (29:45), Cowboys-Patriots (34:15), Dolphins-Browns (41:45), Giants-Bears (44:00), Bucs-Falcons (45:30), Panthers-Saints (48:30), Broncos-Bills (51:00) and Ravens-Rams (53:20).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
